articles.title: Grey's Anatomy's Sandra Oh opens up about her departure - Digital Spy
articles.description: "I think it was just all creative. All creative."
articles.content:

In the time since, she's become an even bigger star across four seasons of… [+2007 chars]

articles.title: "Percy Jackson" Fans Are Praising The Important Casting Choices Made For Disney's Adaptation And I Couldn't Agree More - BuzzFeed
